explanation: [0-0] A pair of hands holds a green bamboo leaf. At the bottom of the screen, there is a white dialog box with the words: I miss you. Below the leaf are a bowl of glutinous rice and a bowl of raw meat. Beside it is a brown wooden board with two wrapped zongzi on it, and a green plant next to it.

[0-8] The hands skillfully fold the leaf into a cone shape, then use a spoon to fill it with a spoonful of glutinous rice and flatten it. Then, they take a piece of pork belly and place it on top, followed by another spoonful of glutinous rice.
